sources.title: Dulcimer Street
sources.description: Title: Dulcimer Street Summary: Percy Boon lives with his mother in a shared rented house with an assortment of characters in central London. Although well intentioned, Percy becomes mixed up with gangsters and a murder. ... Directed by: Sidney Gilliat Actors: Richard Attenborough, Alastair Sim, Fay Compton Production Company: Individual Pictures Release Date: 7 November 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Percy Boon lives with his mother in a shared rented house with an assortment of characters in central London. Although well intentioned, Percy becomes mixed up with gangsters and a murder. The story focuses on the effects this has on Percy and the other residents.

metadata.Plot: Percy Boon lives with his mother in a shared rented house with an assortment of characters in central London. Although well intentioned, Percy becomes mixed up with gangsters and a murder. The story focuses on the effects this has on Percy and the other residents.
metadata.Writer: Norman Collins, Sidney Gilliat, J.B. Williams
metadata.Actors: Richard Attenborough, Alastair Sim, Wylie Watson
